Class TestLoggerAssert.MdcComparator

java.lang.Object
com.github.valfirst.slf4jtest.TestLoggerAssert.MdcComparator
Enclosing class:
TestLoggerAssert
public static final class TestLoggerAssert.MdcComparator extends Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final TestLoggerAssert.MdcComparator
    CONTAINING
    Validates the MDC contains all specified entries, but will not fail if additional entries exist.
    static final TestLoggerAssert.MdcComparator
    EXACT
    Validates the contents of the MDC on the logging event exactly match the specified values.
    static final TestLoggerAssert.MdcComparator
    IGNORING
    Disables verification of the MDC contents.
